definition: to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: He waited until he heard shots. Then he peered through the skylight, into the darkened tavern.
sentences.chinese: 他等到槍聲響起，才透過天窗朝陰暗的酒館內看去。

sentences.english: Later, at home, Zilla would accuse him of being a coward and a weakling .
sentences.chinese: 等到了家裏，齊拉就數落他是個懦夫，軟骨頭。

sentences.english: I followed this kitty all around the places, and finally got this lovely shot.
sentences.chinese: 我追著它繞來繞去，最後終於等到這張可愛的照片。

sentences.english: She waited until the applause had died down, then spoke again.
sentences.chinese: 她等到掌聲變小了，才又開始說話。

sentences.english: When the women reached age 40, Leupp measured their levels of depression .
sentences.chinese: 等到她們40歲時，萊普分別測試她們的抑鬱程度。

sentences.english: So when we come to personal identity which we will do in later lecture.
sentences.chinese: 所以，等到我們在後面的課上講到人格同一性時。

sentences.english: I don't know if I'm ready for round one - we'll have to wait and see!
sentences.chinese: 我不知道我是否準備好了，我們必須等到比賽再看。

sentences.english: Xiao Yang went to the bookstore and book shop, the boss told her to wait until the phone.
sentences.chinese: 楊小曼去書店訂書，店老闆告訴她等到了電話聯繫。

sentences.english: Fine, until that asset is worth less than the outstanding loan.
sentences.chinese: 等到這筆財產的價值低於未償貸款的時候，罰款。

sentences.english: Test teams are unblocked and moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 測試團隊解除了此處的等到，並繼續前進。

sentences.english: Ye Lang finally wait until the old company calls, the acquisition agreement is received.
sentences.chinese: 葉朗終於等到舊公司的來電，收購協議書亦收到。

sentences.english: IF and WHEN both looked at the man and wondered what he wanted.
sentences.chinese: “如果”和“等到”看着這個人，不知道他想幹什麼。

sentences.english: Or such mangling can be performed automatically after an executable is created.
sentences.chinese: 或者也可以等到可執行文件生成之後再自動化切碎。

sentences.english: Or wait until the trouble to repair, often has a very serious problem.
sentences.chinese: 否則等到出毛病才送修，往往問題已經很嚴重。

sentences.english: Pay him his wages each day before sunset, because he is poor and is counting on it.
sentences.chinese: 要當日給他工價，不可等到日落。

definition: a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
until/(used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)
